posts.post_content:
Rare postcard which features multiple Hall of Famers including Tinker, Evers, Chance and Brown. In the middle is Charles Murphy, owner of the Cubs. Population of just three on SGC, none on PSA.  

[url=https://flic.kr/p/92cdPS][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/5249/5264360016_afc3b9f8c9_z.jpg[/img][/url]
